item.description:
This Ride has two options.  You can stay on the Wakefield Bike Path or you can join me, as we Ride around Narragansett.  This is a Loop Ride, so we must stay together as a Group. We will Travel some Back Roads and see plenty of Water & Boats.  I even  plan to visit an Island, if the Tide is Low enough. LOL  Then it is off to the Point Judith Lighthouse for our break.  We return by Ocean Road & the Narragansett Pier.  If you still want more, you can do the other half of the Wakefield Bike Path.

 

This Ride is around 25 - 30 miles.  I plan to average around 13 mph.

The New Directions, will avoid any Beach Traffic.

 

New Directions:  95 South,  Exit 9 / Route 4 South, this is a left lane exit,  Then take exit 5B,  take a left on Route 2 & continue on till you hit Route 138.  Left on Route 138 East / you can take a Right on Route 108 / at the Light go  Right on Curtis Corner Rd. ( NOTE : Sign may say Saugatucket Rd ) / School is down on the Right.

 

Directions: 95 South / Exit 9, Route 4 South / Route 1 South / Route 138 West / go 4 Miles Left at Light on Route 108 / at the Light go  Right on Curtis Corner Rd. ( NOTE : Sign may say Saugatucket Rd ) / School is down on the Right.
item.name: Bike Around Narragansett
